title: Jodi Hisey, LMT
description: p Jodi specializes in providing manual therapy for treatment and prevention of chronic pain relief and postural dysfunction. She has over 13 years of experience in bodywork massage and has a vast background working at luxury spas, chiropractic offices, and private practice. Jodi utilizes orthopedic massage, craniosacral massage, sports massage, myofascial release, deep tissue, trigger point therapy, and is trained in both prenatal and lymphatic massage. Jodi is thrilled to be practicing in the Integrative Medicine department at Baylor Scott White. br br In her personal time, Jodi likes to spend time with her family, outdoor activities like hiking, and volunteering at her church in Round Rock. p
cleaned_text: providing manual therapy for treatment and prevention of chronic pain relief and postural dysfunction. She has over 13 years of experience in bodywork massage and has a vast background working at luxury spas, chiropractic offices, and private practice. Jodi utilizes orthopedic massage, craniosacral massage, sports massage, myofascial release, deep tissue, trigger point therapy, and is trained in both prenatal and lymphatic massage. Jodi is thrilled to be practicing in the Integrative Medicine department at Baylor Scott & White. In her personal time, Jodi likes to spend time with her family, outdoor activities like hiking, and volunteering at her church in Round Rock.
